sentences.en: Amy: We have tomatoes, tofu and fish. Here is our school menu.
sentences.cn: 艾米: 我们吃番茄 、 豆腐和鱼. 这是我们学校的菜单.

sentences.en: But I also use it on baked potatoes, salads, tofu, and dozens of other foods.
sentences.cn: 但是，我也用它来混合烤土豆，沙拉，豆腐，和几十个其他食物。

sentences.en: Effects of Soybean on the yield and texture of Tofu are reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述国内外有关大豆原料对豆腐得率和质构影响的研究.

sentences.en: Famous painting Dingzhou mixed vegetable tofu brick road is indispensable.
sentences.cn: 有名的定州杂绘菜是少不了砖路豆腐的.

sentences.en: He is adept at cooking dishes with rice tofu.
sentences.cn: 他最善于用米豆腐作为原料烹调菜肴了.

sentences.en: Made dry tofu strip has uniform thickness and water content.
sentences.cn: 豆干成品厚薄均匀,含水量一致.

sentences.en: Mandarin - style meals usually include vegetable dishes, soups, tofu and fish.
sentences.cn: 满清菜系通常包括蔬菜盘 、 、 豆腐和鱼.

sentences.en: Mix the minced dace, cornstarch, egg and seasonings with the Tofu.
sentences.cn: 再把鲮鱼肉 、 粟粉 、 蛋和调味料加入豆腐中拌匀.

sentences.en: Most types of tofu are enriched with calcium and thus, prevents osteoporosis.
sentences.cn: 大多数类型的豆腐富含钙,因此可以防止骨质疏松症.

sentences.en: Other food products include soybean milk, tofu, salad sprouts, and soy sauce.
sentences.cn: 其它豆制食品则有豆浆 、 豆腐 、 豆芽沙拉和酱油.

sentences.en: Soy products like tofu, tempeh and fortified soymilk do double duty in this regard since they provide both calcium and protein.
sentences.cn: 大豆食品像豆腐、豆豉和强化豆奶在这方面有双重功能，因为它们可同时提供钙和蛋白。

sentences.en: The most stinky and tasty tofu is coming to serve you!
sentences.cn: 最臭最美味的臭豆腐马上来!

sentences.en: There are Naipi son, butter, cheese milk and tofu, and so on.
sentences.cn: 主要有奶皮子 、 奶油 、 奶酪、奶豆腐等.

sentences.en: This dish of tofu is delicious, but a little too hot.
sentences.cn: 这个豆腐也好吃, 但有点过辣了.

sentences.en: Tofu: Soft, Bland , custardlike food product made from soybeans.
sentences.cn: 豆腐用大豆制作的柔软 、 温润 、 状如蛋奶的食品.

sentences.en: Workers were very busy with stuffing special pork mince paste into tofu.
sentences.cn: 有人忙煎,有人忙将肉酱塞进豆腐内.

trans.tran_en: a soft white food made from  soya beans , used in cooking instead of meat
